1.0.name: wordpress/social-network
1.0.description:
• How to Use?

  • Just Complete the fields after that the social Network icons shows up Automatically in all your posts.

  • If you want a particular incons hidden just leave the field empty.
  • If you have any problem please send me an email at walid.naceri@yahoo.com
  • For more free plugins and scripts Follow me on Twitter @walid_naceri
  • I programme for free for you :) if you want to donate Paypal: walid.naceri@yahoo.com
